agree: By signing up, you agree to our
forgot_pw_content: Enter your email below and we’ll get you back into your account.
email_sent_content: We`ve sent a password reset link to your email. Use this link to change your password.
welcome_to_tenure_content: Before we get started, we need to know a few things about you.
you_located_content: We will use the location for localized deal offers.
link_card__content: If you opt into round-ups, we’ll calculate the amount, total it and at the end of the month, send it to your money manager to move funds into your investment account. If you are a student your card will not be charged for cashback offers.
link_card_content: With your linked card, you can get exclusive cash-back offers and round-up all purchases
link_card_empty: You have no linked cards at this time
link_payment_card_content: By connecting your payment card, we’ll automatically save when you regularly spend.
link_your_card_content1: By clicking Link below you authorize the payment card network (i.e. Visa, Mastercard) can monitor your payment card and share your transaction details (such as date, time, amount and merchant) from purchases as required to participate in the Program as per the
link_your_card_content2: . Debit transactions are not monitored. Your transaction data will be shared with the Program provider, Olive Group Ltd., and Tenure to enable card-linked offers, identify offers that may be of interest to you based on location, calculate round-up amounts, and provide Program notifications. You may opt-out of this transaction monitoring at any time by going to your ‘program settings’.
payment_linked_failed: Payment card link failed. Please try again

sliders.title: The Tenure Platform
sliders.text: Once you sign up, there are four ways we help save your money.

sliders.title: Cash-back
sliders.text: Use your linked card for an exclusive offer at participating merchants and receive a percentage of the purchase to put toward your student debt.

sliders.title: Round-up
sliders.text: We calculate a round-up amount on every linked card purchase to a set amount, total it and at the end of the month, send that total to your money manager to move the funds from your pre-authorized debit account into your investment account.

sliders.title: Goal-setting
sliders.text: With Tenure you can create multiple financial goals and save towards them.

sliders.title: Employer contributions
sliders.text: Your employers can create Tenure accounts help you reach your financial goals faster.

round_up_content: We round up every purchase you make and put that money towards your savings.
max_weekly_round_up_amount: Enter your maximum weekly round-up amount
savings_goal_content: Let`s set some goals and contribute a portion of your spending to your savings
savings_goal_empty_content: You haven’t created any savings goas yet
featured_goal_empty_content: There are no featured deals at this time
goal_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete this goal?
savings_info_empty_content: You have no savings information at this time
pin_content: Enter your pin to complete the transfer

travel_deal.title: MakeMyTrip
travel_deal.description:
50% off a 5-Day All-Inclusive Caribbean Cruise
Description: Escape to paradise with this incredible deal on a 5-day all-inclusive Caribbean cruise. Sail aboard a luxurious cruise ship and experience the breathtaking beauty of the Caribbean islands. Enjoy unlimited gourmet dining, exciting onboard activities, live entertainment, and access to various amenities throughout your journey.
inclusion: 50% off the regular price of the cruise fare.
Complimentary cabin upgrade to a balcony stateroom.
Access to multiple destinations in the Caribbean, including popular ports of call.
Onboard swimming pools, fitness center, and spa facilities.
Evening shows, live performances, and themed parties.
All meals and non-alcoholic beverages included.
24/7 dedicated onboard customer service.
termsAndConditions: Offer valid for new bookings made before 01/06/2023.
Discount applies to the base cruise fare only and does not include taxes, fees, or gratuities.
Subject to availability and cabin capacity.
Additional terms and restrictions may apply. Please review the cruise line's website or contact their customer service for complete details.
Airfare and ground transportation to and from the embarkation port are not included.

food_deal.description: Limit is one redemption per customer in one visit. Cannot be combined with out promotions.

notification_policy: As a part of Tenure, we send offers within this app and, if you opt-in for promotional messages by email and/or push notifications as you choose to receive notifications above. To learn more about Tenure's information practices, please read our Privacy Policy.
